name: govel-framework-docs
description: A comprehensive Go framework with Laravel-inspired patterns and robust commit system
author: Go Framework Team

scripts.format:all-verbose: pnpm run format:json && pnpm run format:yaml && pnpm run format:html && pnpm run format:jsx && pnpm run format:js && pnpm run format:css && pnpm run format:md && pnpm run format:xml && pnpm run format:vue && pnpm run format:svelte
scripts.format:css: prettier --write "**/*.{css,scss,sass,less}" --ignore-unknown || echo 'No CSS files found to format'
scripts.format:html: prettier --write "**/*.html" --ignore-unknown || echo 'No HTML files found to format'
scripts.format:js: prettier --write "**/*.{js,ts}" --ignore-unknown || echo 'No JS/TS files found to format'
scripts.format:json: prettier --write "**/*.json" --ignore-unknown || echo 'No JSON files found to format'
scripts.format:jsx: prettier --write "**/*.{jsx,tsx}" --ignore-unknown || echo 'No JSX/TSX files found to format'
scripts.format:md: prettier --write "**/*.{md,mdx}" --ignore-unknown || echo 'No Markdown files found to format'
scripts.format:svelte: prettier --write "**/*.svelte" --ignore-unknown || echo 'No Svelte files found to format'
scripts.format:vue: prettier --write "**/*.vue" --ignore-unknown || echo 'No Vue files found to format'
scripts.format:xml: prettier --write "**/*.xml" --ignore-unknown || echo 'No XML files found to format'
scripts.format:yaml: prettier --write "**/*.{yml,yaml}" --ignore-unknown || echo 'No YAML files found to format'
scripts.test:commit: echo 'Testing commit message format...' && commitlint --from HEAD~1 --to HEAD
